problem: Can you only see hippopotamus in Africa?
gt_solution:
The United States has several zoos featuring hippopotamus.
In the UK, you can see hippopotamus at the Marwell Zoo.
facts: The United States has several zoos featuring hippopotamus.
In the UK, you can see hippopotamus at the Marwell Zoo.
decomposition: Where are animals kept for recreation/sightseeing?
